C3: Save matrix to a csv file.
Selects rows listed in $R$ from the csv-file fname.
Splits the rows from the csv-file fname modulo $n$.
Selects columns listed in $R$ from the csv-file fname.
Selects rows listed in $R$ and columns listed in $C$ from the csv-file fname.
Sorts each individual row in the given csv file, thinking of the entries as a set.
Sorts the rows in the given csv file.
Joins csv file fname according to column with label col-label. This option is given once for each file that should be joined.
Join csv files f1, f2, ... The output is written to fname-out.
Join csv files. The input files arise from fname-mask with all values $i=0,\ldots,N-1.$ The output is written to fname-out.
Produces a latex table from the given csv-file. The binary variable header determines whether a header is produced.
Produce a bitmap graphic, see Table~\ref{tab:bitmap}.
Reformat the data from fname-in in nb-cols columns. Write the output to fname-out.
Split the file fname-in by values. For each value, a separate file is written.
